name: Sketchy Girl Dress Up Game!
description:
A Dress Up game made in RPG Maker (in one afternoon haha)
*******

Credits:

Plugins:
Galv's RollCredit Plugin
Mjshi's Non-Combat Menu
SumRndmDde's Picture Choices Plugin
Music:
VoiD1 Gaming
Lunalucid
Soundeffects:
moludar

****

This game was inspired by this video!

Honestly, there aren't a lot of choices... I just wanted o see if it's possible to make a dress-up game in RPG Maker (It is)

If you have any suggestions on more choices/designs, feel free to let me know in the comments :3

Feel free to also reach out on any of my SocMed^^
